[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA stack-based buffer overflow was detected during fuzz testing of the Mongoose HTTP[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlibrary. AddressSanitizer reports a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte write overflowing a stack buffer in the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting routines, triggered via the HTTP parser’s logging path when handling [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmalformed or unexpected input.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Issue  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  During fuzzing with libFuzzer, AddressSanitizer flagged a stack-buffer-overflow [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min the function `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcalled by `mg_putchar_iobuf_static`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m inside[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/mongoose/src/printf.c`. The overflow occurs within the stack frame of [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf` in `src/mongoose/src/fmt.c`, specifically when writing to the local [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marray `tmp371`.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Vulnerability type  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack-based buffer overflow in the printf/fmt subsystem.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Key observations and findings  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The overflow is a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte write at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m, just beyond the end of `tmp371` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39msize [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in `mg_vxprintf`.  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Frame layout shows two stack objects: `tmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and `tmp371` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith the write at byte [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m.  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The call chain begins in `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` → `mg_http_parse` → `mg_log` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m→ `mg_vxprintf` → formatting helpers → buffer write.  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The bug surfaces during conversion/formatting of values [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., via `mg_dtoa` or[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_snprintf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and then logging.[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Code areas for further investigation  [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `src/mongoose/src/fmt.c`, especially the implementation of `mg_vxprintf`, [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`scpy`, and formatting logic around `tmp371`.  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `src/mongoose/src/printf.c`, in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private`, [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_putchar_iobuf_static`, `mg_vsnprintf`, and `mg_snprintf`.  [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The interaction in `src/mongoose/src/log.c` where formatted messages pass [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthrough the I/O buffer.  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The HTTP parser in `src/mongoose/src/http.c`, which invokes logging and may [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcraft unexpected format arguments.[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[39m:          double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m321[0m[39m:          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m322[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m323[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m324[0m[39m:          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m325[0m[39m:          n++;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m326[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m327[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m328[0m[39m:    [0m[39m  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'%'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root Cause Analysis[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The overflow stems from the tiny local array `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` in the scientific [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m‘e’[0m[35m/[0m[39m’E’[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m formatting branch of `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/mongoose/src/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:317[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m328[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Calls to `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` can return a length `k` up to [0m[1;36m9[0m[39m, and `[0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparam, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` will read and forward all `k` characters without checking for the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNUL terminator or buffer bounds, causing a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte overflow past `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch Location[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - File: src/mongoose/src/fmt.c[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Function: mg_vxprintf, in the `else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` block [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlines [0m[1;36m317[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m328[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch Steps[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. Enlarge the temporary buffer to safely accommodate the maximum formatted [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moutput:[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      – Change `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` to `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmatching the non-scientific [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbranch’s buffer size[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. Tighten buffer boundaries by passing the real buffer length to `mg_dtoa`:[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      – Replace the hard-coded `[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m` with `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` in the call:  [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m[33mwidth[0m[39m=*[0m[35m/[0m[95m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c. Clamp the returned length `k` to prevent `scpy` ever reading beyond the NUL:[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      – Immediately after each formatting helper call [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_dtoa` and `mg_lld`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, do:[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         ```[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mk >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m k = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mk[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         ```[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   d. Invoke `scpy` only with the sanitized `k`:[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      – `n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   e. Repeat length-clamp logic for the exponent formatting line [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_lld` → `k` → [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`scpy`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Preservation of Existing Logic[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All original formatting behavior and precision rules remain unchanged:  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Mantissa width [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and exponent formatting [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_lld`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m parameters are [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muntouched.  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • The overall layout [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmantissa then ‘e’[0m[35m/[0m[39m’E’, then exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is preserved.  [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No changes to the public API, harness code, or other formatting branches, so [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexisting tests and fuzz targets still exercise the same code paths.[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Side-Effect Analysis and Mitigation[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Stack usage increases by ~[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m bytes in the ‘e’[0m[35m/[0m[39m’E’ branch; this is negligible [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfor modern systems.  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Using `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` ensures future changes to buffer size automatically [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpropagate to the clamp logic.  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Testing should include edge cases with extremely large or small floating-point[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalues to confirm no new formatting truncation issues.[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Validation[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Rebuild Mongoose and run existing test suite to confirm no regressions.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Re-run AddressSanitizer-enabled fuzzing on `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` to ensure [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe stack-buffer-overflow no longer triggers.[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Optionally add a dedicated unit test for scientific formatting that requests [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmore than [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m characters in the mantissa to guard against future shrinkage of this [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mRelevant context:[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code_range>src/mongoose/src/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:317[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m328[0m[39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_range[0m[39m>[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/25/25 19:32:26][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=894543;file:///home/qqor/aixcc/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=380158;file:///home/qqor/aixcc/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         - Stdout:                                                                            [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + [33mFUZZER[0m=[35mfuzz[0m                                                                        [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + shift                                                                              [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + [32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m [32m'!'[0m -v TESTCASE [32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                            [2m               [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m-byte stack-buffer-overflow in the function `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39min [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/mongoose/src/fmt.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, specifically when formatting floating-point numbers [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The overflow was detected in a stack buffer named `tmp371`.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Patch attempt: In the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` handling branch of `mg_vxprintf`, the developer [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mincreased a local buffer from `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` to `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`, updated calls to [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_dtoa` to pass the new buffer size, and added bounds checks plus null [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mterminators. [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Patch result: After applying the patch and rerunning the fuzzer, the same [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack-buffer-overflow recurred at the same stack offset, but again in the second [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlocal buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, indicating the overflow source was not the first `tmp` but[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39ma later buffer in the same function.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m→ `mg_log` → `mg_vxprintf`.  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - AddressSanitizer reported a write of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m at a stack address corresponding [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in the `mg_vxprintf` frame.  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Two local arrays exist in that frame:  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `tmp` at byte offsets [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m72[0m[39m  [0m                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mimmediately after `tmp371`.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The root buffer overflow is triggered by formatting logic in `mg_vxprintf` [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mspecialized branch for `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlabeling the overflow object as `tmp371` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe second local array, not the enlarged [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mone[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Call stack and shadow memory layout are identical, confirming the overflow [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msite was untouched by the patch.[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Areas for further investigation  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The second local array [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in `mg_vxprintf`, declared around line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mof `src/fmt.c`. Its size and usage when formatting various types needs review.  [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The overall stack usage in `mg_vxprintf`: how many temporary buffers are [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated, their sizes, and the maximum possible write length from `scpy`.  [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The implementations of `mg_dtoa` and `mg_lld` to understand their maximum [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moutput lengths under different inputs.  [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The generic output routine `scpy` and its interaction with the output [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcallback, to confirm no writes exceed buffer bounds.[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-v [0m[35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmprtf1g4e6[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAn AddressSanitizer report shows a stack-buffer-overflow in the Mongoose code’s [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting routines. The overflow occurs in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` via `scpy` → [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf`, when writing past a small stack buffer. A patch was attempted that:[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Changed `mg_lld` to take an explicit buffer length and added bounds checks.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Updated all calls to `mg_lld` to pass `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mRe-running the fuzzer after the patch still triggers the same one-byte overflow at [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moffset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in the same stack frame. The patch did not eliminate the overflow.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• A libFuzzer run with AddressSanitizer hits a stack-buffer-overflow in  [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mprintf.c[0m[39m` → `mg_pfn_iobuf_private`.  [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• Traces back through `scpy` → `mg_vxprintf` → `mg_vsnprintf` → `mg_snprintf` → [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_dtoa` → `mg_vxprintf` again.  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• The frame for `mg_vxprintf` contains two stack objects:  [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  – ‘tmp’, at offsets [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  – ‘tmp371’, at offsets [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• The overflow write lands at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m, i.e. one byte past the end of `tmp371`.  [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• No evidence suggests a false positive; the overflow is real.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• Modified the signature of `mg_lld` to accept `buflen` and only write if `s + n + [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m < buflen`.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• Added explicit null-termination in `mg_lld`.  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• Updated all calls in `fmt.c` to pass `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` as the buffer length.  [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  – In particular, calls in the integer‐printing branch and the exponent branch use[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Result  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• The fuzzer log after patching still reports the identical overflow: same address,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msame stack frame offsets, same call stack.  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• The overflow still writes one byte past `tmp371` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte stack buffer[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mindicating that that buffer’s bounds are not respected.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. The declaration and usage of the two stack buffers in `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m~[0m[1;36m247[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m323[0m[39m in `src/fmt.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. Determine which buffers are used for mantissa vs. [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexponent and what their sizes really are.  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. The second call to `mg_lld` in the exponent‐formatting branch: it still passes [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe size of the first buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m while writing into the second buffer [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. The implementation of `scpy` and `mg_pfn_iobuf_private`: verify that they never [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwrite beyond the provided length argument.  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. The float‐to‐string routine [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_dtoa`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and its interaction with the two local [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffers. Ensure all formatting paths respect the buffer bounds.[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m328[0m[39m:    [0m[39m  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'%'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:321[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m324[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m321[0m[39m:          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m322[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m323[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m324[0m[39m:          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root-Cause Analysis  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The one-byte overflow occurs in the exponent‐formatting branch of [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf`, where a small `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` buffer is used.  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - That branch calls two formatting helpers:  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     a[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, [0m[33mc[0m[39m==[0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`  [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m `[0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In the last patch, we correctly revised `mg_lld` to take `buflen` and added [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbounds checks, and all its calls [0m[1;39m([0m[39mincluding in the exponent branch[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m now pass [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - However, **the call to `mg_dtoa` still hard-codes `[0m[33mdstlen[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m`**, which exceeds[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe actual buffer length of [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, leading to writes past `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` and corrupting the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnext stack object [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch Outline  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. **Fix the `mg_dtoa` invocation** in the exponent branch so that it never [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwrites past `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`.  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Change the second parameter from the constant `[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m` to `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Preserve the `width` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprecision[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m argument of `[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m` and the `tz` flag [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[33mc[0m[39m==[0m[32m'e'[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. **No changes to `mg_dtoa` itself** are needed beyond using the correct [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`dstlen`. It already obeys its `dstlen` argument and null‐terminates.  [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   C. **Re-run existing tests and the fuzzer** to confirm the overflow is resolved [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand no regressions occur.[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Detailed Steps  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Open `src/fmt.c` and locate the exponent‐formatting branch around line [0m[1;36m317[0m[39m.  [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Replace:[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      with:[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Keep the subsequent `n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` and the corrected [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_lld` call unchanged.  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Compile and run the full test suite plus the libFuzzer harness.  [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Ensure AddressSanitizer no longer reports any stack‐buffer‐overflow in [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf`.[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Justification  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Safety**: By passing the real buffer size [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` = [0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m into [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_dtoa`, we guarantee it cannot write beyond `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m..[0m[1;36m7[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`. `mg_dtoa` uses its [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`dstlen` parameter to bound all writes and null‐terminates the output.  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Minimal Impact**: This is a single‐line change in the high‐level formatting [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlogic. It does not touch external libraries, fuzz-harness code, or unrelated [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mutility functions. Existing functionality and tests remain intact.  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Consistency**: Other branches already invoke `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis change brings the exponent branch into line with the rest of `mg_vxprintf`.  [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Prevent Recurrence**: With both formatting paths [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_dtoa` and `mg_lld`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnow uniformly guarded by explicit buffer lengths, no further overflows can occur in[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthis function’s stack buffers.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Side-Effects & Mitigation  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Precision/Width Unchanged**: Only the buffer length parameter changes; the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnumeric formatting precision [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnumber of digits[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is still controlled by the `width` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39margument passed to `mg_dtoa` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m8[0m[39m digits after the decimal for `%e`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Performance**: Negligible; introducing `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` has no runtime cost.  [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Testing**: Confirm that logging, HTTP parsing, and all existing unit/fuzz [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtests pass without new failures.[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code_range>src/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:321[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m324[0m[39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_range[0m[39m>[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    #[0m[1;36m14[0m[39m [0m[1;36m0x55eabbe21302[0m[39m in main [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/src/llvm-project/compiler-rt/lib/fuzzer/[0m[95mFuzzerMain.cpp[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m20:10[0m                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[35m/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/[0m[95mlibc.so.6+0x24082[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mBuildId: [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m5792732f783158c66fb4f3756458ca24e46e827d[0m[1;39m)[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    #[0m[1;36m16[0m[39m [0m[1;36m0x55eabbde87ad[0m[39m in _start [0m[1;39m([0m[35m/out/[0m[95mfuzz+0x647ad[0m[1;39m)[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    #[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m [0m[1;36m0x55eabbf579ff[0m[39m in mg_vxprintf [0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mfmt.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;36m247[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[32m'tmp'[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m276[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/aixcc/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-v [0m[35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmprtf1g4e6[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe codebase exhibits a stack-buffer-overflow in the `mg_vxprintf` path when [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting floating-point numbers via `mg_dtoa` and copying them into a fixed‐size [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. An AddressSanitizer report pinpoints a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte write past the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mend of a [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer. A patch was attempted to change the `mg_dtoa` call to [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maccept the full buffer length [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m instead of a hardcoded size, but the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow persists according to a fresh ASan run.[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Initial Issue  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - A fuzzing run using libFuzzer and AddressSanitizer reports a [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack-buffer-overflow in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` during log formatting.  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The overflow originates in `[0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.[0m[1;92mc:233[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m when copying `tmp` into the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moutput buffer.  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In the stack frame of `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.[0m[1;92mc:247[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, two local arrays exist:  [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `tmp` at offsets [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `tmp371` at offsets [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The offending write is at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m, immediately past the end of `tmp371`, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mindicating that `tmp371` is too small for the formatted output in some cases.  [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The sanitizer backtrace:  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     #[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m mg_pfn_iobuf_private → #[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m scpy → #[0m[1;36m3[0m[39m mg_vxprintf.specialized.[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m → #[0m[1;36m6[0m[39m mg_dtoa [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m→ #[0m[1;36m7[0m[39m mg_vxprintf.[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch Attempt  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `src/fmt.c`, at line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m, the `mg_dtoa` invocation originally passed a [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfixed “[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m” as the buffer size limit.  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The patch changes this call to use `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` instead of `[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m`:  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```diff[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     + k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This ensures that `mg_dtoa` will not overrun the `tmp` buffer with formatting [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moutput longer than [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m characters.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Result After Patch  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - A second fuzzing iteration still triggers the same stack-buffer-overflow at [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe same stack location [0m[1;39m([0m[39moffset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in `tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - ASan backtrace and shadow-map details mirror the initial failure, confirming [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat limiting the `mg_dtoa` output to the full `tmp` size did not prevent the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow in `tmp371`.  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The overflow occurs again in the same functions [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private`, [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`scpy`, `mg_vxprintf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m during HTTP parsing and logging.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Areas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The use and sizing of the two local buffers [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp` and `tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf`. Confirm intended capacities and roles.  [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The implementation of `[0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`: how it computes lengths [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`k`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and writes into [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe output buffer.  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All callers of `mg_dtoa` to ensure buffer-size parameters match actual buffer [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocations.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The specialization of `mg_vxprintf` when handling different format specifiers,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mespecially `%e` and floating-point conversions.  [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Interaction between `mg_log`, `mg_http_parse`, and the formatting routines [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munder unusual or extreme input from the fuzzer.[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Partially addressable: [0m[1;36m01[0m[39m [0m[1;36m02[0m[39m [0m[1;36m03[0m[39m [0m[1;36m04[0m[39m [0m[1;36m05[0m[39m [0m[1;36m06[0m[39m [0m[1;36m07[0m[39m [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Heap left redzone:       fa[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Freed heap region:       fd[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack left redzone:      f1[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack mid redzone:       f2[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack right redzone:     f3[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack after return:      f5[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack use after scope:   f8[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Global redzone:          f9[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Global init order:       f6[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Poisoned by user:        f7[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Container overflow:      fc[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Array cookie:            ac[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Intra object redzone:    bb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ASan internal:           fe[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Left alloca redzone:     ca[0m                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Analysis Report[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m282[0m[39m:          int64_t v = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, int64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
