[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:317[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m328[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[39m:          double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m321[0m[39m:          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m322[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m323[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m324[0m[39m:          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m325[0m[39m:          n++;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m326[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m327[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m328[0m[39m:    [0m[39m  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'%'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root Cause Analysis[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/fmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch declares its own small [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`.  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - It calls `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnow correctly using `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` into that [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte space.  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Even though we’ve limited `mg_dtoa` to [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes, it [0m[1;39m([0m[39mand `mg_lld`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m still write [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39ma NUL terminator or multi-digit exponent, which can land at `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`, one past the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer, triggering the ASan overflow at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe end of the [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte `tmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The outer `mg_vxprintf` function already has a [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte buffer `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mused by `%f`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%g`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which is large enough for both the mantissa [0m[1;39m([0m[39mup to [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m12[0m[39m [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchars[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and exponent [0m[1;39m([0m[39mat most [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m5[0m[39m chars plus terminator[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Strategy[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. Eliminate the shadowed [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch and instead [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreuse the existing [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte `tmp` declared at the top of `mg_vxprintf`.  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. Ensure all calls in that branch use `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnow [0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m when invoking [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_dtoa`.  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   C. Leave the `[0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` call unchanged [0m[1;39m([0m[39mits output, at most a[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfew chars, easily fits in [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   D. This single change removes any possibility of writing beyond the end of a [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtiny [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte array and keeps the formatting logic identical.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Implementation Steps[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `src/fmt.c`, locate the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m317[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```c[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-        char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* reuse the [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m from the outer scope *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-        k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         n++;[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'%'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Key change**: remove the `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` line so that references to `tmp` now[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbind to the [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte buffer declared earlier in the function.[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Confirm that the `mg_dtoa` call is already using `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and leave [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_lld` as is.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Rebuild and re-run the ASan+fuzzer harness to verify that the [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack-buffer-overflow no longer occurs.[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Safety**: By using a [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte buffer, both the mantissa [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_dtoa`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexponent [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_lld`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m have ample room [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmantissa ~[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m chars, exponent up to [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m5[0m[39m chars [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mplus any terminator[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Minimal footprint**: No new buffers are introduced, no changes to test or [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mharness code, and existing functionality/formatting are preserved exactly.  [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Consistency**: Mirrors the `%f`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%g` branch, which already depends on the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m40[0m[39m-byte `tmp`.  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **No over-catching**: We do not add blanket truncation or exception [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mswallowing—only the buffer boundaries are corrected.  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Regression safety**: Existing calls to `mg_dtoa` and `mg_lld` in other [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbranches remain unchanged; all scpy/out logic is untouched.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Potential Side Effects & Mitigation[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Slightly larger stack frame**: The inner `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` is removed, so the total [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack usage may shift by a few bytes, but the outer `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` was already [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated—no net increase.  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Mantissa precision**: `mg_dtoa` is still limited to [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m digits after the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdecimal point in `%e`; truncation behavior is unchanged.  [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Formatting semantics**: The order and exact characters emitted [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdigit, dot, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdigits, `e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`E`, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are identical; downstream consumers see no difference.  [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **No impact on harness/tests**: Tests that verify log or HTTP-parse output [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwill continue to pass, but the ASan fuzzer will no longer detect an overflow.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Verification[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Re-run `make asan_fuzz` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor equivalent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m for at least [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m fuzz iterations to [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mensure the overflow is eliminated.  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Add a unit test formatting edge‐case values with `%e` [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., `[0m[1;36m1.23e45[0m[39m`, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;36m0.000001[0m[39m`, very large/small doubles[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and verify the strings are correctly produced[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwithout crashes.  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Ensure coverage tools confirm the `%e` branch is executed.  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf` frame. Its bounds are reported as bytes [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, and the overflow [0m  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       n++;[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The only change was replacing the hardcoded `[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m` length argument to `mg_dtoa` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Result After Patch  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Re-running the same fuzz target produced an identical AddressSanitizer report.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The overflow still occurs at the same address and same stack frame [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`mg_vxprintf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, indicating the patch did not prevent writing past the local [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The stack layout in the new log remains:[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Object `[0m[32m'tmp'[0m[39m` at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Object `[0m[32m'tmp371'[0m[39m` at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m – overflow at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Areas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The implementation of `mg_dtoa` and its interaction with the provided length [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39margument.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The logic in `scpy` to ensure it respects the length of its source buffer.  [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The overall stack layout in `mg_vxprintf`, including all local arrays [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp`, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tmp371`, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and any padding or redzones.  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The formatting code paths for other specifiers [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., `%f`, `%g`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to compare [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer allocations and usage patterns.  [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The output callback `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` in `printf.c` to verify indexing or[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointer arithmetic when writing formatted data.[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m---[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m33[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;39m([0m[39mx-x[0m[1;39m)[0m[35m/[0m[95m0.0[0m[39m; [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;35mlog[0m[1;39m([0m[39m-#[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m = NaN *[0m[35m/[0m                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m41[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx == [0m[1;36m0x3ff00000[0m[39m && u.i<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m42[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m43[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* reduce x into [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[35m/[0m[95m2[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m][0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m44[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx += [0m[1;36m0x3ff00000[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m0x3fe6a09e[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m45[0m[39m:     [0m[39mk += [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx>>[0m[1;36m20[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m0x3ff[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m46[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx&[0m[1;36m0x000fffff[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m0x3fe6a09e[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m47[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.i = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mhx<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m | [0m[1;39m([0m[39mu.i&[0m[1;36m0xffffffff[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m48[0m[39m:     [0m[39mx = u.f;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m49[0m[39m:     [0m[39mf = x - [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m50[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhfsq = [0m[1;36m0.5[0m[39m*f*f;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m51[0m[39m:     [0m[39ms = f/[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2.0[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m52[0m[39m:     [0m[39mz = s*s;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m53[0m[39m:     [0m[39mw = z*z;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m54[0m[39m:     [0m[39mt1 = w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg2+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg4+w*Lg6[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m55[0m[39m:     [0m[39mt2 = z*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg1+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg3+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg5+w*Lg7[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m56[0m[39m:     [0m[39mR = t2 + t1;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m57[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* See log2.c for details. *[0m[35m/[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m58[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* hi+lo = f - hfsq + s*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhfsq+R[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ~ [0m[1;35mlog[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhi = f - hfsq;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.f = hi;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.i &= [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m62[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhi = u.f;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m63[0m[39m:     [0m[39mlo = f - hi - hfsq + s*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhfsq+R[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m64[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* val_hi+val_lo ~ [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + k*[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m65[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_hi = hi*ivln10hi;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m66[0m[39m:     [0m[39mdk = k;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m67[0m[39m:     [0m[39my = dk*log10_2hi;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m68[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_lo = dk*log10_2lo + [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlo+hi[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*ivln10lo + lo*ivln10hi;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m69[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m70[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * Extra precision in for adding y is not strictly needed[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m71[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * since there is no very large cancellation near x = [0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m72[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * x = [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m/[0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, but we do it anyway since it costs little on CPUs[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m73[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * with some parallelism and it reduces the error for many args.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m74[0m[39m:     [0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m75[0m[39m:     [0m[39mw = y + val_hi;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m76[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_lo += [0m[1;39m([0m[39my - w[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + val_hi;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m77[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_hi = w;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m78[0m[39m:     [0m[39mreturn val_lo + val_hi;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m79[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m80[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m81:d[0m[39mouble [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble base, int64_t exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m82[0m[39m:  double result = [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m85[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m86[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < exponent; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m87[0m[39m:      result *= base;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m88[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m89[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m90[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < -exponent; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m91[0m[39m:      result [0m[35m/[0m[39m= base;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m92[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m93[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m94[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m If exponent is [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, result remains [0m[1;36m1.0[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m95[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m98[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m99:d[0m[39mouble [0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble x[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m100[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mx >= [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m108[0m[39m:  int n = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m118[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m119[0m[39m:static int [0m[1;35mxisinf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble x[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m120[0m[39m:  union [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m121[0m[39m:    double f;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m123[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m ieee754 = [0m[1;39m{[0m[39mx[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m124[0m[39m:  return [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39munsigned[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mieee754.u >> [0m[1;36m32[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m & [0m[1;36m0x7fffffff[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m == [0m[1;36m0x7ff00000[0m[39m &&[0m           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m199[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz && n > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m && buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m == [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m n--;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Trim trailing zeroes[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m200[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtz && n > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m && buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m == [0m[32m'.'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m n--;           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Trim trailing dot[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:207[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m227[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m207[0m[39m:static size_t [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *buf, int64_t val, bool is_signed, bool is_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m208[0m[39m:  const char *letters = [0m[32m"0123456789abcdef"[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m209[0m[39m:  uint64_t v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m val;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m210[0m[39m:  size_t s = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, n, i;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m211[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_signed && val < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m, v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m-val[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m212[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m This loop prints a number in reverse order. I guess this is because we[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m213[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m write numbers from right to left: least significant digit comes last.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m214[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Maybe because we use Arabic numbers, and Arabs write RTL?[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m215[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m216[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; v; v >>= [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = letters[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mv & [0m[1;36m15[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m217[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m218[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; v; v [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = letters[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mv % [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m219[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m220[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Reverse a string[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m221[0m[39m:  for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < n [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m222[0m[39m:    char t = buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m223[0m[39m:    buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - i - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - i - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = t;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m224[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m225[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mval == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle special case[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m226[0m[39m:  return n + s;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m227[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:107[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m117[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m107[0m[39m:static int [0m[1;35maddexp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *buf, int e, int sign[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m108[0m[39m:  int n = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m109[0m[39m:  buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m110[0m[39m:  buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m sign;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m111[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39me > [0m[1;36m400[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m112[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39me < [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m113[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39me >= [0m[1;36m100[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39me [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m + [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, e -= [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m * [0m[1;39m([0m[39me [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m100[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m114[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39me >= [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39me [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m + [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, e -= [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m * [0m[1;39m([0m[39me [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m115[0m[39m:  buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39me + [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m116[0m[39m:  return n;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m117[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root Cause Analysis  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` formatting branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_vxprintf in src/fmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, a small [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfixed-size stack buffer `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` is used to format both the mantissa [0m[1;39m([0m[39mvia [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_dtoa`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and the exponent [0m[1;39m([0m[39mvia `mg_lld`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - While `mg_dtoa` respects the provided buffer length [0m[1;39m([0m[39mafter the patch, [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, `mg_lld` does not take a length argument and can emit more digits [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthan fit in [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes, leading to a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte stack overflow when exponent digit count [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexceeds the buffer capacity.  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. High-Level Fix Strategy  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Allocate a sufficiently large stack buffer for the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch to hold [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mboth the mantissa and any possible exponent encoding safely.  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Reuse the existing [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte buffer size from the `%g`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%f` branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor size it to accommodate the worst-case mantissa and exponent.  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Update the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch in mg_vxprintf to:  [0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     a[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Declare `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` instead of `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`.  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Call `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, [0m[33mc[0m[39m==[0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mas already [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatched[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Write the `[0m[32m'e'[0m[39m`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m` manually via the output callback.  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     d[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Call `[0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp + mantissa_len, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`, passing the exponent [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minto the tail of the buffer—thereby avoiding overwriting the mantissa.  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     e[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m When invoking `scpy` for both parts, use the distinct lengths returned [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`mantissa_len` and `exponent_len`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This ensures both parts write into bounded regions and the buffer is large [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39menough to hold even extreme exponent values [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., “[0m[1;36m-400[0m[39m” to “+[0m[1;36m400[0m[39m” yields at most [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m~[0m[1;36m5[0m[39m characters[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Detailed Step-by-Step Patch Plan  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m In src/fmt.c, locate the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch starting at line ~[0m[1;36m317[0m[39m.  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Change the buffer declaration to `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmatching `%f`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%g` path[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Split formatting into two stages:  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      i[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Mantissa formatting:  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         - `size_t mlen = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`  [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         - `n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, mlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ii[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Print the exponent marker and its digits:  [0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         - `[0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; n++;`  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         - `size_t elen = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp + mlen, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         - `n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp + mlen, elen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`  [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   d[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Remove the old single-call `[0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` invocation and ensure [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcorrect offsets.  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   e[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m No other branches or external functions are modified. All existing tests and [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mharness code remain untouched.  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Justification  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By matching the `%f`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%g` branch’s buffer sizing [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, we guarantee [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mample room for both mantissa and exponent parts, addressing the unbounded writes in[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_lld`.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Splitting into two calls with offset prevents `mg_lld` from overwriting [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmantissa data and bounds exponent writes to the tail of the buffer.  [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This retains existing formatting semantics [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmantissa precision, exponent [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmarker, exponent digits[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and does not alter any harness or external APIs.  [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Preservation of Codebase Logic  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` formatting behavior remains identical: mantissa is formatted [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith up to [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m digits, exponent marker printed, and exponent digits follow.  [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The change is purely internal to mg_vxprintf and mg_lld usage; no other code [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpaths or utility functions are affected.  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Potential Side Effects and Mitigations  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Increase of stack usage by ~[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m bytes in the `%e` path: negligible for typical [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39menvironments.  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Tests relying on exact internal buffer sizes are unlikely; string outputs [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mremain unchanged.  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Validate via existing test suite and fuzz targets to ensure no regressions.  [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
